Interface KernelIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Kernel

    public interface KernelIF

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] attributeNames()
      Returns the names of the attributes Initializes the kernel from the given file of data points.
      double[][] kNNQuery(int k, double... attributes)
      Performs a k-Nearest Neighbor search for the given k-value and attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • attributeNames

        String[] attributeNames()
        Returns the names of the attributes Initializes the kernel from the given file of data points.
        Returns:
        The named attributes for the data set

      • kNNQuery

        double[][] kNNQuery(int k,
                  double... attributes)
        Performs a k-Nearest Neighbor search for the given k-value and attributes.
        Parameters:
        k - Required number of neighbors.
        attributes - The feature vector.
        Returns:
        The found cases
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if attributes is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if attributes contains any Double.NaN
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if k < 1 or if the attributes array is of zero length
